thread.section_title: Warrior Trading Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Warrior Trading | warriortrading.com
thread.title: David Dabe Kim
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by David Dabe Kim

author: David Dabe Kim
title: David Dabe Kim
text:
There are so many reasons why Warrior Trading provides the best education.
1. Ross provides indirect live mentoring EVERY SINGLE DAY in his chatroom. He explains nearly every entry and every exit. He also does an incredible job at explaining the basics of market sentiment. By spending an extended period of time listening, you begin to be able to pick up on market sentiment.
2. Ross provides extremely clear teaching that is easy to understand.
3. The Warrior Trading team as a whole is great. They have a news desk and hundreds of other traders that are keeping an eye out on the market.
4. The stock scanners that Ross provides is the best--bar-none.
5. Ross is very emotionally healthy and adopts a very humble attitude although he is an elite trader. You will immediately sense this when you enter his chatroom or even send an e-mail.
6. All the resources and information that Ross gives via podcasts, free books, youtube are all invaluable resources.
